org.jetel.graph

Interface OutputPortDirect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OutputPort
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcurrentOutputPort, Edge, JobflowEdge

    public interface OutputPortDirect
extends OutputPort
    An interface defining operations expected from OutputPortDirect object This interface is complementary to OutputPort. In order to work properly, initialization/opening of port must be first done through OutputPort interface calls.
    Since:
    August 13, 2002
    See Also:
    OutputPort

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void writeRecordDirect(java.nio.ByteBuffer record)
      Deprecated. 
      writeRecordDirect(CloverBuffer) instead
      void writeRecordDirect(CloverBuffer record)
      An operation that passes/writes one record through this port.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jetel.graph.OutputPort

        close, connectWriter, eof, getByteCounter, getEdge, getMetadata, getOutputByteCounter, getOutputPortNumber, getOutputRecordCounter, getReader, getRecordCounter, getUsedMemory, getWriterWaitingTime, open, reset, writeRecord

    • Method Detail

      • writeRecordDirect

        void writeRecordDirect(CloverBuffer record)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        An operation that passes/writes one record through this port.
        The passed-in object (CloverBuffer) must be ready to be read - i.e. CloverBuffer.position() should be 0 and CloverBuffer.limit() should be pointing to the end of data in the buffer.
        Parameters:
        record - CloverBuffer containing the data to be written/sent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If writing failed during method call
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If thread waiting to be notified was interrupted
        Since:
        August 13, 2002

      • writeRecordDirect

        @Deprecated
void writeRecordDirect(java.nio.ByteBuffer record)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Deprecated. writeRecordDirect(CloverBuffer) instead
        An operation that passes/writes one record through this port.
        The passed-in object (ByteBuffer) must be ready to be read - i.e. ByteBuffer.position() should be 0 and ByteBuffer.limit() should be pointing to the end of data in the buffer.
        Parameters:
        record - ByteBuffer containing the data to be written/sent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If writing failed during method call
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If thread waiting to be notified was interrupted
        Since:
        August 13, 2002
